mapper.select: SELECT t2.id, t1.code `softType`, t1.`value` `typeName`, t2.version, t3.id `softId`, t3.name `softName`, t2.creator, t2.create_time, t2.update_time FROM sys_dictionary t1 LEFT JOIN soft_manager t2 ON t1.code = t2.dict_soft_type AND t2.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN soft_info t3 ON t1.code = t3.dict_soft_type AND t2.fk_soft_id = t3.id AND t3.is_del = 0 WHERE t1.is_del = 0 AND t1.type = 'softType' ORDER BY t1.order_num DESC, t1.code
select * from soft_manager where fk_soft_id = #{softType} and is_del = 0
select * from soft_manager where id = #{id} and is_del = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO soft_manager(id, dict_soft_type, is_del) VALUES (#{id}, #{softType}, #{isDel})
